name: motus.vim
summary: Dark color scheme based on the popular torte setup. Good for LCD and consoles
description:
This is a modification of the popular grey-on-black color scheme vimscript #111 (torte).
It looks great on LCDs and full-screen consoles; I also like it in grey-on-black xterm and KDE Konsole with Linux Colors scheme.
Screenshot is here:
http://motus.kiev.ua/motus2/Files/motus_vim.png
Enjoy!
install_details:
Copy this file into your ~/.vim/colors/ directory and run
    colorscheme motus
in the vim command line. If you like the scheme, add 'colorscheme motus' line to your ~/.vimrc
